response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and relevance to you, estimated at $10,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality item at a favorable rate. Should you choose to accept this offer, please let me know, and we will proceed with the transaction promptly. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to serving you soon.", "product_price": 9500}
